title: Fifth Estate - Run For Your Life (CBC atsc HDTVrip)
description:
For thousands of young Hondurans, the only hope of finding a way out of the grinding poverty of their existence is to begin a perilous journey of up to 5000 km that will take them to &#039;el norte&#039;--the north; 
either the United States or Canada. By foot, by train, always on the lookout for murderous gangs 
that prey on the desperate travellers, they risk their lives to reach the promised land where, 
as illegals, they might be able to earn some a little money to send home. 

Originally broadcast in 2004, Run For Your Life is as topical today as it ever was and essential viewing to understand the tide of humanity that, every day, puts everything on the line in order to have a better life.

Episode Website: http://www.cbc.ca/fifth/runforyourlife/
